metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9920 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: steps/mail/sendmail.inc in Roundcube before 1.1.7 and 1.2.x before 1.2.3, when no SMTP server is configured and the sendmail program is enabled, does not properly restrict the use of custom envelope-from addresses on the sendmail command line, which allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via a modified HTTP request that sends a crafted e-mail message.

criterions.comment: roundcube package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1').
